info.name: iFrame Widget
info.summary: Display external Websites in a Dashboard Widget
info.description:
**🔲 iFrame Widget for Nextcloud Dashboard**
This app adds a customizable iFrame widget to your Nextcloud dashboard, allowing you to embed external websites directly within Nextcloud.
## ✨ Features
- **🌐 Embed any website** directly in your Nextcloud dashboard - **🎨 Customize appearance** with custom titles and icons - **🎭 SimpleIcons integration** using the `si:` prefix for thousands of brand icons - **🖌️ Colorize icons** with a built-in color picker - **📏 Adjustable height** for perfect layout integration - **📱 Responsive design** with extra-wide display option (2 columns)
## 🛠️ Configuration
The widget is highly customizable with options for: - Custom title and icon - Icon coloring - iFrame height - Wide display mode
## 🔒 CSP Configuration
If you encounter Content Security Policy errors, you may need to adjust your Nextcloud configuration to allow embedding specific websites. See the full documentation on GitHub for details.
## 💻 Compatibility - Nextcloud 30 & 31
